com.mygames

Class GameBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygames.GameBoard

  • public class GameBoard
extends Object
    This is the class which initializes the Game Board with specified size and creates an empty board to play. Also with every move it does validations and update the board with the symbol accordingly.
    Author:
    Garima Agarwal

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameBoard(int size)
      Parameterized Constructor to set the size of the board

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkIfWon()
      Method to check if after the last entry on the board, any player has won the game or not.
      (package private) void doNextMove(Move move)
      Method to do the actual move on the board and make the entry with corresponding symbol based on the move passed.
      boolean evaluateMove(Move move)
      Method to evaluate the passed move if it can be entered on the board.
      char[][] getBoard()
      Returns a 2D array representation which will be given to the players So that they can decide their moves.
      int getSize()
      Method to fetch the size of the board
      boolean isNextMovePossible()
      Method to check if all cells are filled or is there still a possibility of a move.
      void printBoardForHumans()
      Method to print the current status of the board.

        Parameterized Constructor to set the size of the board

    • Method Detail

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Method to fetch the size of the board
        Returns:
        length Board Size

      • getBoard

        public char[][] getBoard()
        Returns a 2D array representation which will be given to the players So that they can decide their moves.
        Returns:
        board Array of Board

      • doNextMove

        void doNextMove(Move move)
        Method to do the actual move on the board and make the entry with corresponding symbol based on the move passed.
        Parameters:
        move - The Move object

      • printBoardForHumans

        public void printBoardForHumans()
        Method to print the current status of the board. This is required for the human player so that they can choose their moves.

      • evaluateMove

        public boolean evaluateMove(Move move)
        Method to evaluate the passed move if it can be entered on the board. It checks if the cell entered is available for entry or is already filled and return true or false accordingly.
        Parameters:
        move - The Move object
        Returns:
        true If the move can be entered false Otherwise

      • isNextMovePossible

        public boolean isNextMovePossible()
        Method to check if all cells are filled or is there still a possibility of a move.
        Returns:
        true If Board is still Empty for next move false Otherwise

      • checkIfWon

        public boolean checkIfWon()
        Method to check if after the last entry on the board, any player has won the game or not. It checks all rows, columns and two diagonals for it.
        Returns:
        true If the Game is Won false Otherwise
